title: Create the duality chain
description:
# Launching the duality-second-rehearsal-1 Chain

This is the proposal to create the first persistent duality chain, "duality-second-rehearsal-1".

Please visit the [cosmos/testnets](https://github.com/cosmos/testnets/tree/master/replicated-security/duality-second-rehearsal-1/) repo for additional details.
